title: Lakshmi Kasu Mala - Divine Temple Necklace
materials: Rubies. Features a rich Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Kasu Mala features a central Lakshmi motif, intricately designed with nakshi work detailing. The pendant is further embellished with flanking peacocks adorned with emeralds. It features a delicate lattice of CZ stones. The necklace consists of CZ stones. The pendant is completed with suspending gold gundlu/beads. An antique gold finish accents the traditional elements.
colors: with vibrant accents of green from the emeralds and a hint of red from the rubies. The CZs add a sparkling white brilliance.
occasions: and other traditional South Indian ceremonies. A statement piece for any festive occasion
description: This Kasu Mala is a harmonious blend of tradition and elegance, handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The Lakshmi motif is a symbol of prosperity and auspiciousness, making it a valuable heirloom piece. The high-quality CZ stones offer a dazzling sparkle, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability.
